member.name: T:Fbx.DeflateWithChecksum
member.summary: A wrapper for DeflateStream that calculates the Adler32 checksum of the payload

member.name: P:Fbx.DeflateWithChecksum.Checksum
member.summary: Gets the Adler32 checksum at the current point in the stream

member.name: M:Fbx.DeflateWithChecksum.ResetChecksum
member.summary: Initializes the checksum values

member.name: T:Fbx.ErrorLevel
member.summary: Indicates when a reader should throw errors

member.name: F:Fbx.ErrorLevel.Permissive
member.summary: Ignores inconsistencies unless the parser can no longer continue

member.name: F:Fbx.ErrorLevel.Checked
member.summary: Checks data integrity, such as checksums and end points

member.name: F:Fbx.ErrorLevel.Strict
member.summary: Checks everything, including magic bytes

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxAsciiWriter
member.summary: Writes an FBX document in a text format

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxAsciiWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a new reader

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxAsciiWriter.MaxLineLength
member.summary: The maximum line length in characters when outputting arrays
member.remarks: Lines might end up being a few characters longer than this, visibly and otherwise, so don't rely on it as a hard limit in code!

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxAsciiWriter.Write(Fbx.FbxDocument)
member.summary: Writes an FBX document to the stream
member.remarks: ASCII FBX files have no header or footer, so you can call this multiple times

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxBinary
member.summary: Base class for binary stream wrappers

member.name: F:Fbx.FbxBinary.footerCodeSize
member.summary: The size of the footer code

member.name: F:Fbx.FbxBinary.binarySeparator
member.summary: The namespace separator in the binary format (remember to reverse the identifiers)

member.name: F:Fbx.FbxBinary.asciiSeparator
member.summary: The namespace separator in the ASCII format and in object data

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinary.CheckEqual(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks if the first part of 'data' matches 'original'
member.returns: true if it does, otherwise false

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinary.WriteHeader(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the FBX header string

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinary.ReadHeader(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads the FBX header string

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinary.GenerateFooterCode(Fbx.FbxNodeList)
member.summary: Generates the unique footer code based on the document's timestamp

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinary.GenerateFooterCode(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a unique footer code based on a timestamp

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinary.WriteFooter(System.IO.BinaryWriter,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes the FBX footer extension (NB - not the unique footer code)

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinary.CheckFooter(System.IO.BinaryReader,Fbx.FbxVersion)
member.summary: Reads and checks the FBX footer extension (NB - not the unique footer code)

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxBinaryReader
member.summary: Reads FBX nodes from a binary stream

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinaryReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Fbx.ErrorLevel)
member.summary: Creates a new reader

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinaryReader.ReadNode
member.summary: Reads a single node.
member.remarks: This won't read the file header or footer, and as such will fail if the stream is a full FBX file
member.exception: The FBX data was malformed for the reader's error level

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinaryReader.Read
member.summary: Reads an FBX document from the stream
member.exception: The FBX data was malformed for the reader's error level

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxBinaryWriter
member.summary: Writes an FBX document to a binary stream

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxBinaryWriter.CompressionThreshold
member.summary: The minimum size of an array in bytes before it is compressed

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinaryWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a new writer

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxBinaryWriter.Write(Fbx.FbxDocument)
member.summary: Writes an FBX file to the output

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxDocument
member.summary: A top-level FBX node

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxDocument.Version
member.summary: Describes the format and data of the document
member.remarks: It isn't recommended that you change this value directly, because it won't change any of the document's data which can be version-specific. Most FBX importers can cope with any version.

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxException
member.summary: An error with the FBX data input

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxException.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: An error at a binary stream offset

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: An error in a text file

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxException.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.Stack{System.String},System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: An error in a node object

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxNode
member.summary: Represents a node in an FBX file

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxNode.Name
member.summary: The node name, which is often a class type
member.remarks: The name must be smaller than 256 characters to be written to a binary stream

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxNode.Properties
member.summary: The list of properties associated with the node
member.remarks: Supported types are primitives (apart from byte and char),arrays of primitives, and strings

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxNode.Value
member.summary: The first property element

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxNode.IsEmpty
member.summary: Whether the node is empty of data

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxAsciiReader
member.summary: Reads FBX nodes from a text stream

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxAsciiReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Fbx.ErrorLevel)
member.summary: Creates a new reader

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxAsciiReader.MaxArrayLength
member.summary: The maximum array size that will be allocated
member.remarks: If you trust the source, you can expand this value as necessary. Malformed files could cause large amounts of memory to be allocated and slow or crash the system as a result.

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxAsciiReader.ReadNode
member.summary: Reads the next node from the stream

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxAsciiReader.Read
member.summary: Reads a full document from the stream

member.summary: Static read and write methods

member.summary: Reads a binary FBX file

member.summary: Reads an ASCII FBX file

member.summary: Writes an FBX document

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxIO.WriteAscii(Fbx.FbxDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Writes an FBX document

member.name: T:Fbx.FbxNodeList
member.summary: Base class for nodes and documents

member.name: P:Fbx.FbxNodeList.Nodes
member.summary: The list of child/nested nodes
member.remarks: A list with one or more null elements is treated differently than an empty list, and represented differently in all FBX output files.

member.summary: Gets a named child node

member.name: M:Fbx.FbxNodeList.GetRelative(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a child node, using a '/' separated path
